title: Michael's First Swimming Lesson
story: Good morning, Michael. Good morning, mom. Today is your first swimming lesson. I know. I'm a little scared. Don't be, dear. You will like it. I hope so. The teacher is very good. Okay, mom. I'll give it my best.
summary: A young boy overcomes his fear of swimming with the support of his mom and a good teacher.
image: An illustration of a young boy wearing swimming goggles and holding a pool noodle.
